patterns: What is a Student Points Management System?
responses: Hello! This website is for keeping track of student participation in event in which they are given a point for each event they attend. You can add a point to a user at an event. Have fun!

patterns: Where can I find my profile?
responses: You can find your profile on the top right menu!

patterns: How can I change my password?
Where can I change my password?
responses: You can change your password on the top right menu! Make sure you put in the old password correctly and the new/confirm password match!
You can logout in the top right menu!

patterns: What is in the quarters tab?
What can I do with quarters?
responses: These are the quarters that are set for the school year!

patterns: What is in the events tab?
What can I do with events?
What is in the events time tab?
What can I do with events time?
responses: You can view event names and the time for each events!

patterns: What is in the prize tab?
What can I do with prizes?
responses: You can see the prizes the school offers for a student!

patterns: What is in the winners tab?
What can I do with winners?
responses: You can see the winners from the previous or current quarters!

patterns: What is in the student point records tab?
What can I do with points?
responses: You can view student attendance of events. You can use this to double check added points!

patterns: How can I create a point?
Where can I add a point?
What is the Add Point tab?
responses: If you are checking in people for an event, you can use the add-point tab to register a point! Fill in the respective fields!
